gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Getting the spatial distribution and abundance indices of benthic and demersal fauna of the continental shelf of Galicia and Cantabrian Sea. Hydrographic survey of the neritic zone led to its influence on the distribution of species. Sampling using a box corer to obtain granulometrics indices of sediment.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SeaVoX salt and fresh water body gazetteer
